main event: A naval crew reported sighting a white, round or oval object moving at high speeds in the Atlantic on February 6, 1962.
interesting points: The object was observed for 30 minutes and reached an altitude of 9000 feet before dropping to 6500 feet,The object changed direction by 110° at a bearing of 270°,The initial sighting occurred 30-40 miles east of Bermuda,This report is part of the historical Project Blue Book investigation into UFOs,The object was first noticed due to its brightness, which was greater than any visible star.
sighted object: a white and round or oval object
witness description: naval crew members observing through binoculars
